abdomen.liver: enhances homogenously, no focal liver lesions
abdomen.kidneys: enhance and excrete contrast without evidence of hydronephrosis
abdomen.free_air_fluid: no free air or free fluid

pelvis.appendix: mildly dilated measuring 7-8 mm, does not fill with oral contrast
pelvis.mucosa: mild hyperemia without significant surrounding fat stranding
pelvis.physiologic_cyst: 19-mm cyst in the left adnexa, right adnexa unremarkable

findings.osseous_structures: no suspicious lytic or blastic lesions
